Gallifrey One – More 2013 Guests Announced!

by Chris

Leave a Comment

<![CDATA[ Two months (has it already been that long?) since the first guests were announced, Gallifrey One, the longest-running North American Doctor Who convention, has released the second batch of guests for its next iteration, running February 15-17, 2013. One very familiar face leads… Continue Reading “Gallifrey One – More 2013 Guests Announced!”

The 2012 edition of Gallifrey One, the largest (and in our opinion best) fan-run Doctor Who convention in the world, is almost upon us. Gallifrey One’s Network 23 takes place from February 17-19 at the LAX Marriott Hotel in Los Angeles, CA, and Radio… Continue Reading “Radio Free Skaro at Gallifrey One’s Network 23”
